export const quiz4 = {
  "quizTitle": "Section 4: Exotics",
  "quizSynopsis": "This is the real hard part - let's see how well you know your exotics.",
  "appLocale": {
    "landingHeaderText": "<questionLength> Exotic Perks",

    "answers": ["https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/7/7a/Two-tailed_fox_icon1.jpg", "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/9/91/Rat_king_icon1.png", "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/9/91/Rat_king_icon1.png", "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/9/91/Rat_king_icon1.png"],
    "correctAnswer": "4",
    "messageForCorrectAnswer": "This is only here to satisfy a certain madman. It gets hard, so be ready.",

    "explanation": "Vermin: Reloading immediately after a kill grants a brief period of invisibility.",

    "segment2": "5 Points",
    "point": "5"
  }, {
    "question": "What perk is this?",
    "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/7/70/Archer%27s_gambit_icon1.png",
    "questionType": "text",
    "answers": ["Taken Predator", "Archer's Gambit", "Onslaught", "Archer's Tempo"],
    "correctAnswer": "2",
    "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Good job - but also, bless your soul. That's a lot of gambit.",
    "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "This was a unique perk, exclusive to the Gambit pinnacle bow: Hush.",
    "explanation": "Archer's Gambit: Hip-fire precision hits grant a massive draw-speed bonus for a short duration.",
    "segment": "Medium",

    "question": "What perk is this?",

    "questionType": "text",
    "answers": ["Killing Wind", "Celerity", "Unrelenting", "Last Stand"],
    "correctAnswer": "2",
    "messageForCorrectAnswer": "This was probably an easy one if you're a frequent Trials player. Props!",
    "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "This was probably pretty difficult if you don't play Trials often. So basically, you're sane.",
    "explanation": "Celerity: Gain buffs to target acquisition, flinch, handling, and reload speed while you are the last living member of your fireteam.",
    "segment": "Medium",

    "point": "10"
  }, {
    "question": "What perk is this?",
    "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/7/77/Meganeura_icon1.png",
    "questionType": "text",
    "answers": ["Dragonfly", "Evolution", "Poison Arrows", "Meganeura"],
    "correctAnswer": "4",
    "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Good! And what an underrated perk, seriously.   :(",
    "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Another unique perk, exclusive to the Vanguard pinnacle scout: Oxygen SR4.",
    "explanation": "Meganeura: Dragonfly deals more damage based on the number of precision hits dealt beforehand.",

sourcesContent:
export const quiz4 =  {
  "quizTitle": "Section 4: Exotics",
  "quizSynopsis": "This is the real hard part - let's see how well you know your exotics.",

  "appLocale": {
    "landingHeaderText": "<questionLength> Exotic Perks",
    "question": "Perk",
    "startQuizBtn": "Try me.",
    "resultFilterAll": "All",
    "resultFilterCorrect": "Correct",
    "resultFilterIncorrect": "Incorrect",
    "nextQuestionBtn": "Next",
    "resultPageHeaderText": "You have completed this section. You got <correctIndexLength> out of <questionLength> questions.",
    "singleSelectionTagText": "Section 2",
    "pickNumberOfSelection": "Choose <numberOfSelection>",
  },

  "questions": [
    {
      "question": "Which exotic weapon does this perk belong to?",
      "questionType": "photo",
      "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/b/bf/Vermin_icon.png",
      "answers": [
        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/7/7a/Two-tailed_fox_icon1.jpg",
        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/9/91/Rat_king_icon1.png",
        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/9/91/Rat_king_icon1.png",
        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/9/91/Rat_king_icon1.png"
      ],
      "correctAnswer": "4",
      "messageForCorrectAnswer": "This is only here to satisfy a certain madman. It gets hard, so be ready.",
      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Rat King is a quest exotic that must be earned with a fireteam.",
      "explanation": "Vermin: Reloading immediately after a kill grants a brief period of invisibility.",
      "segment": "Easy",
      "segment2": "5 Points",
      "point": "5",
    },
    {
      "question": "What perk is this?",
      "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/7/70/Archer%27s_gambit_icon1.png",
      "questionType": "text",
      "answers": [
        "Taken Predator",
        "Archer's Gambit",
        "Onslaught",
        "Archer's Tempo"
      ],
      "correctAnswer": "2",
      "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Good job - but also, bless your soul. That's a lot of gambit.",
      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "This was a unique perk, exclusive to the Gambit pinnacle bow: Hush.",
      "explanation": "Archer's Gambit: Hip-fire precision hits grant a massive draw-speed bonus for a short duration.",
      "segment": "Medium",
      "segment2": "10 Points",
      "point": "10",
    },
    {
      "question": "What perk is this?",
      "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/f/f8/Celerity_icon1.png",
      "questionType": "text",
      "answers": [
        "Killing Wind",
        "Celerity",
        "Unrelenting",
        "Last Stand"
      ],
      "correctAnswer": "2",
      "messageForCorrectAnswer": "This was probably an easy one if you're a frequent Trials player. Props!",
      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "This was probably pretty difficult if you don't play Trials often. So basically, you're sane.",
      "explanation": "Celerity: Gain buffs to target acquisition, flinch, handling, and reload speed while you are the last living member of your fireteam.",
      "segment": "Medium",
      "segment2": "10 Points",
      "point": "10",
    },
    {
      "question": "What perk is this?",
      "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/7/77/Meganeura_icon1.png",
      "questionType": "text",
      "answers": [
        "Dragonfly",
        "Evolution",
        "Poison Arrows",
        "Meganeura"
      ],
      "correctAnswer": "4",
      "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Good! And what an underrated perk, seriously.   :(",
      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Another unique perk, exclusive to the Vanguard pinnacle scout: Oxygen SR4.",
      "explanation": "Meganeura: Dragonfly deals more damage based on the number of precision hits dealt beforehand.",
      "segment": "Medium",
      "segment2": "10 Points",
      "point": "10",
    },
    {
      "question": "What perk is this?",
      "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/0/0d/Reversal_of_fortune_icon1.png",
      "questionType": "text",
      "answers": [
        "Reversal of Fortune",
        "MIDA Radar",
        "Sensor Pack",
        "Radar Tuner"
      ],
      "correctAnswer": "1",
      "messageForCorrectAnswer": "I'm not quite sure how often people use Revoker - this might've been obvious.",
      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "You don't have Revoker, the Crucible pinnacle sniper? Neither do I.",
      "explanation": "Reversal of Fortune: Missing a shot returns the bullet to the magazine after a short duration.",
      "segment": "Medium",
      "segment2": "10 Points",
      "point": "10",
    },
  ]
}

export default quiz4;
